Rat Trap swallows hard and ducks to try to avoid the red light on the camer=
a.

"Right.  But before we go any further, ya better duck.  That light's at=
tatched to an active camera, I've seen that before.  Hmmm, which kinda give=
s me an idea... Risky but it's an idea.. Where there's camreas, there's got=
ta be wires and without wires, no power, no cameras.   But if I just nibble=
 at one that doesn't mean there's not a whole bunch of these around the com=
plex..  We gotta follow these camera wires'n see where they lead exactly.  =
There's sure ta be a control box that delivers power ta all the cameras on =
sight...  Hmm, okay, crawl space is a little small but I know that's not go=
nna be a problem for us.  Ready?  I dunno if I am but I'm gonna go in anywa=
y."

Outside the fortress, Tucson continues to stand vigil, but fails to re=
alize that when he had gone into battle, he had not quite allowed himself t=
ime to fully recharge.  It was taking a toll on him, as he listens to an au=
dible power indicator  which indicates sixty percent power available.

" Do=
wn to sixty percent in my power gauges.  I must have used more than I thoug=
ht. "

Straight Shot knew what she had to do.  She had always carried an au=
xillary power source in her body.  She takes a power cable from herself, an=
d connects it to an arm port on Tucson.  He raises an optic.

" Straight Sh=
ot, no!  You'll go off line!"

Straight Shot continues to connect herself t=
o him.

" You need it more than I do, and besides, you still have my rechar=
ging dock on your back.  I'll be fine!"

She gives him the power, to get hi=
m to eighty percent. She quickly goes off line, as he's forced to send her =
back to her recharging dock.  The dock covers itself with a metal box like =
cover behind his back.

He shows no sign of retreat, as he now draws his bl=
ade instead of the cross bow.  He nodds to Talon and to Kup.

"Kup, remembe=
r when you first trained me and you forced me to spar with my optics turned=
 off?   Well, I certainly learned a lot from that training.  It's time to p=
ut it to good use.  I assure you I haven't forgotten anything you taught me=
."

He then smiles to Talon.

When in doubt, resort to using what's around =
you to get the job done.  I learned that even without conventional weaponry=
, a battle can still be fought well with good results."

It's at this time =
when one of the enemy's shots, strikes him on the shoulder.

" TAKE COVER!"=


Night Shift is quick to take cover, and reloads his plasma riffle.

"Son =
of a slag ball scrap heap!  Where the pit did that come from?!"

He spots t=
he wound on Tucson's shoulder, which now oozes lubricant.

" Woah, boss, yo=
u're hit!"

Tucson turns his head.

"It's nothing, I've been through worse.=
"

Night Shift feverishly scans the skies and tries hard to figure out how =
to combat everyone without getting trapped by them.  

" That's it, these s=
lag balls wanna play dirty, then so am I!  I got a few emp grennades in my =
manifold and I'm not afraid ta deploy 'em!"

Tucson narrows his optics.

" =
Hmmm...  If we disperse those accordingly, it may buy us some time.. All ri=
ght, I suggest you use one at a time, and space out the amount of ammo that=
 you use, don't use them all at once."

Night Shift nodds.

"Right, Kup, Ta=
lon, we can all do this.  Here, each of ya take one.  If we spread out we c=
an cover more ground."

He gives them both a grennade, and shows them how t=
o deploy them.

"Like Tucson said, we use these one at a time at separate i=
ntervals."  Okay, let's do this."

At the Ark, Quickstride keeps his vigil =
continuously.  He flicks his tail at near by insects, and then has an idea.=
  Perhaps one that could "Stink" out the enemy.

"Wait a sec, that's it.. W=
hen in doubt, stink'em out.  What better way to expose the enemy than to cr=
eate an incredibly stinky environment...  Lord Elder, I suggest you get ins=
ide...  Things might get a little bit noxious out here."

He quickly scoops=
 up a mouth full of bean pods, and devours a large amount of them.  He rais=
es his tail and releases a large amount of gas.

" Any time nowwww..."
